articles.title: Hemp cannabinoids may have evolved to deter insect pests - Phys.org
articles.description: Cannabinoids, naturally occurring compounds found in hemp plants, may have evolved to deter pests from chewing on them, according to experiments that showed higher cannabinoid concentrations in hemp leaves led to proportionately less damage from insect larvae.
